mapper.sql: select d.category_id, d.parent_id, d.ancestors, d.category_name, d.order_num, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time from sys_category d
mapper.select: select concat(d.category_id, d.category_name) as category_name from sys_category d left join sys_role_dept rd on d.category_id = rd.category_id where d.del_flag = '0' and rd.role_id = #{roleId} order by d.parent_id, d.order_num
select count(1) from sys_category where category_id = #{categoryId} and del_flag = '0'

select d.category_id, d.parent_id, d.ancestors, d.category_name, d.order_num, d.status, (select category_name from sys_category where category_id = d.parent_id) parent_name from sys_category d where d.category_id = #{categoryId}
select * from sys_category where find_in_set(#{categoryId}, ancestors)
mapper.insert: insert into sys_category( category_id, parent_id, category_name, ancestors, order_num, status, create_by, create_time )values( #{categoryId}, #{parentId}, #{categoryName}, #{ancestors}, #{orderNum}, #{status}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )
mapper.delete: update sys_category set del_flag = '2' where category_id = #{categoryId}
mapper.update:
update sys_category
status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = sysdate()
where category_id in (${ancestors})
